long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convenience extension to help with copying the current selection with reference to the website.

Allows you to get an annotated version of the currently selected text. There are three ways to do that.

* Use the Alt-Y (default, can be changed) shortcut.
* Click on the extension icon.
* Right click the selection and click on "Copy annotation" from the context menu.
